Technique: FORMED BY HAND; ENGRAVED; FAYENCE; ENGRAVED
Name: Shabti
Description: This green faience shabti has all the characteristics of funerary statuettes of the Late Period. It is in the name of Padihoremheb. The piece was probably part of the former collection of É. de Meester de Ravestein, given to the Museum in 1884.
